issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Optimize joins with dynamic capacity for output batches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11053](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11053). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Rather than using the size of the left or right batches to determine the capacity of the output batches we can use the average size of previous output batches.
